Perimeter Guards Near/At IGL:






The perimeter guards made note of Hellpeon flying by and a dozen guards had 
target locks on him with missile launcher-like devices and simply awaited 
orders.

---

One large humanoid with leathery skin approached Demonite.  "Follow me," he 
said, entering through a huge entryway, several guards in the front, several 
more behind Demonite, all armed with laser rifles and laser pistols.

(I'll IM you or private e-mail you for what you'd see inside etc)
